function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Survival of viruses on surfaces for extended periods of time","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission through contact with contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Frequent cleaning of high-touch surfaces and use of alcohol-based disinfectants","Technologies":"Alcohol-based disinfectants, cleaning equipment","People":"General public, building occupants, and workers","Owner":"Health and safety departments, facility management, cleaning staff"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in quantifying the risk associated with fomite pathway","Impact":"Inability to accurately assess the risk of transmission via contaminated objects","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning of often-handled objects and surfaces","Technologies":"Alcohol-based disinfectants, cleaning equipment","People":"Health and safety experts, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health organizations, facility management, cleaning companies"},{"Description":"Effectiveness of specific disinfectants on coronaviruses","Impact":"Inadequate disinfection leading to potential spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Use of tested and recommended disinfectants on various surfaces","Technologies":"Alcohol-based disinfectants, hydrogen peroxide, sodium laureth sulfate","People":"Cleaning staff, facility management, health and safety experts","Owner":"Public health organizations, cleaning companies"}]}
